props.altLabels: Places the labels beneath the step
props.completeIcon: Icon to display when step is marked as completed
props.editIcon: Icon to display when step is editable
props.errorIcon: Icon to display when step has an error
props.nonLinear: Allow user to jump to any step

v-stepper-step.step: Content to display inside step circle

v-stepper-content.step: Sets step to associate the content to

v-stepper.change: Emitted when step is changed by user interaction
